Description: HUGE loft style 2 bed 2 bath. Renovated kitchen with stainless steel appliances, hard wood floors throughout. Laundry located in building. Lofts are for storage only. Unit can occupy up to 4 people. Cats negotiable. Available September 1st, 2023.
